title: Parenting skills recognized as professional capabilities
description: Parenting skills recognized as professional capabilities
content:
Scenario: Parenting skills recognized as professional capabilities
    Given Sarah has professional-grade skills from parenting
    And she manages complex logistics, conflict resolution, developmental psychology
    When the workplace_elohim assesses Sarah's capabilities
    Then it should recognize parenting skills as professional assets
    And it should translate care skills to workplace context
    And Sarah's parenting should enhance her professional value
    And the system should make invisible skills visible to employers
    And parenting experience should be recognized as professional development
    And care work should be valued as capability-building
